prompt: Macro photorealistic shot focusing intensely on a worn tang stamp maker's mark on the steel blade of an antique Bowie knife. A vintage brass magnifying glass is held directly above the mark, slightly distorting the view through its lens. Composition uses shallow depth of field, rendering the rest of the blade and dark wood handle softly blurred. Dramatic, warm directional lighting from the side highlights the texture of the aged steel, the faint indentations of the mark, and catches reflections on the magnifying glass. Professional studio quality, evoking historical discovery. --ar 16:9
name: antique-knife-identification-image-1.png

prompt: Photorealistic flat lay composition showcasing a curated selection of 5 distinct antique folding pocket knives arranged in a gentle arc across a surface of aged, dark brown leather, filling the 16:9 frame. Each knife clearly displays a different handle material: polished yellowed bone, rough textured stag antler, shimmering mother-of-pearl, rich dark ebony wood, and perhaps a patterned celluloid. Soft, diffused overhead lighting minimizes harsh shadows while emphasizing the unique textures, colors, and patinas of each handle material. Sharp focus across all subjects, professional product photography style for material comparison. --ar 16:9
name: antique-knife-identification-image-2.png

prompt: Photorealistic overhead view, slightly angled for depth, of a cluttered antique expert's wooden workbench focused on the knife identification process. Centrally placed is an open antique folding knife with visible mechanisms. Surrounding it are essential tools: a jeweler's loupe, brass calipers measuring the blade, an open reference book showing knife diagrams, a soft cotton cloth, and a small handwritten tag. Warm, focused task lighting illuminates the central area, creating soft shadows and a studious atmosphere. Detailed textures on wood, metal, and paper. --ar 16:9
name: antique-knife-identification-image-3.png

prompt: Wide landscape (16:9) photorealistic shot displaying a diverse collection of antique knives aesthetically arranged horizontally on a weathered, reclaimed barn wood surface. Includes a large clip-point Bowie knife, an ornate European dagger with a decorative guard, a complex multi-blade trapper pocket knife, and a simple fixed-blade skinning knife. Natural window light streams from the left side, casting soft shadows and highlighting the varied forms, materials, and aged patinas. Shallow depth of field keeps the front knives sharp, background softly blurred. Museum display quality, atmospheric mood. --ar 16:9
name: antique-knife-identification-image-4.png

prompt: Intimate photorealistic close-up shot focusing on a pair of hands wearing white cotton gloves carefully writing notes in a leather-bound journal. Beside the journal, resting on a dark velvet cloth, lies an antique dagger with an intricate handle and a metal ruler indicating its length. The composition captures the act of documentation, with the journal, pen, dagger, and ruler filling the 16:9 frame. Soft, natural light illuminates the scene, emphasizing textures. Shallow depth of field blurs the background, creating a calm, studious, archival atmosphere. --ar 16:9
name: antique-knife-identification-image-5.png
